modName: Nicks Skyrim Improvement Guide NSFW Version
summary: The way I play Skyrim -- which mods and softwares I use to make the game better. This version is NSFW (not safe for work) and includes links to mods with "adult-only" content (nudity, swearing and graphic violence).
descriptionHtml:
Update, June 9th, Tuesday, 2015

I was able to buy a new computer a few months ago. It turns out my old one was having a lot of issues, especially with the RAM and memory allocation. Whereas before, I had to deal with frequent inevitable CTDs and long load times, those are no longer a problem and I have returned to playing Skyrim.

Of course, modding is a lot easier now with Nexus-provided prompts on prerequisites for mods. I've also noticed that, while a couple of the mods that I was using are no longer available or outdated, many of them still work just fine. I do plan on updating the guide again at some point in the near future.
author: Nick

files.changelogHtml:
More Categories: Weather and Lighting. Character Makeover: Alternatives
Renamed old categories. Moved some mods around, into the categories in which I felt they most belonged.
Shortened the guided.
Corrected even more spelling and gramatical errors.
Updated various mods. Added new mods, such as Immersive Thunder and Lightning During Storms.
